leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学-谱学解析与表征生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→峰识别→指认→定量→报告

queries: [WEB] deep learning nmr spectrum analysis github
[WEB] mass spectrometry identification ai tools github
[WEB] raman spectroscopy machine learning classification github
[WEB] generative models for molecular spectra github
[WEB] spectral peak fitting python library github

tools.name: Medusa
tools.one_line_profile: Automated analysis tool for high-resolution mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated workflow for unconstrained analysis of high-resolution mass spectrometry (HRMS) data using machine learning, designed to handle complex mixtures.

tools.name: PyBSD
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian spectral deconvolution package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing full Bayesian spectral deconvolution, aiding in the resolution of overlapping spectral peaks.

tools.name: SpectraFit
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for quick data-fitting of spectra distributions
tools.detailed_description: A command-line and Jupyter-notebook tool for quick data-fitting based on regular expressions of distribution functions, supporting various spectral line shapes.

tools.name: DiffSpectra
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular structure elucidation from spectra using diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: An AI model implementation for elucidating molecular structures directly from spectral data using diffusion models, addressing the inverse problem in spectroscopy.

tools.name: Spaceye
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to decode star spectrum images
tools.detailed_description: A tool using OpenCV to decode and analyze images of star spectra to predict characteristics, bridging image processing and spectral analysis.

tools.name: Fitspy
tools.one_line_profile: Generic tool dedicated to fit spectra
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool designed for generic spectral fitting, providing a graphical interface and scripting capabilities for analyzing 1D spectral data.

tools.name: MS²PIP
tools.one_line_profile: Peptide spectrum prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A fast and accurate tool for predicting peptide fragmentation spectra (MS2) for various fragmentation methods, instruments, and labeling techniques.

tools.name: SpeLL
tools.one_line_profile: Conversational AI assistant for spectral analysis
tools.detailed_description: A RAG-based conversational AI system designed to assist with spectral analysis and Python code generation, interacting with local or web-based LLMs.

tools.name: PeakDecoder
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for metabolite identification in LC-IM-MS-DIA
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for metabolite identification and accurate profiling in multidimensional LC-IM-MS-DIA measurements, improving peak resolution and identification.

tools.name: MolSpectLLM
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular foundation model for spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A molecular foundation model bridging spectroscopy, molecule elucidation, and 3D structure generation, enabling multimodal tasks in chemistry.

tools.name: RamanMachineLearning
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for comparing ML classification methods for Raman spectra
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed for comparing various machine-learning-based classification methods specifically for Raman spectroscopy data.

tools.name: K-MSE
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Enhanced Tree Search for Molecular Structure Elucidation
tools.detailed_description: A method boosting LLM's capability in Molecular Structure Elucidation (MSE) using Knowledge Enhanced Tree Search Reasoning.

tools.name: MolPuzzle
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal benchmark for molecular structure elucidation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate Large Language Models on their ability to solve molecular puzzles, specifically focusing on structure elucidation from spectral data.

tools.name: REQPY
tools.one_line_profile: Response spectral matching tool for ground motion components
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for performing spectral matching of horizontal ground motion components to an orientation-independent spectrum (RotDnn), used in earthquake engineering and seismology.

tools.name: ReqPyPSD
tools.one_line_profile: Response spectrum compatible record generation with PSD constraints
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating response spectrum compatible records that satisfy a minimum Power Spectral Density (PSD) function, complementing spectral matching tasks in earthquake engineering.

tools.name: NMR2Struct
tools.one_line_profile: NMR structure elucidation tool
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for elucidating chemical structures from Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) data, developed by the Markland Group.

tools.name: p2108
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of ITU-R P.2108 clutter loss prediction model
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Recommendation ITU-R P.2108 by NTIA/ITS, providing methods for the prediction of clutter loss in telecommunications and wave propagation physics.

tools.name: Carafe
tools.one_line_profile: In silico spectral library generation for proteomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for high-quality in silico spectral library generation designed for data-independent acquisition (DIA) proteomics, facilitating protein identification and quantification.

tools.name: iMSminer
tools.one_line_profile: Data processing and ML package for Imaging Mass Spectrometry
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for processing and analyzing Imaging Mass Spectrometry (IMS) data, including machine learning capabilities for spectral data mining.

tools.name: massformer
tools.one_line_profile: Tandem mass spectrum prediction with Graph Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool using Graph Transformers to predict tandem mass spectra from molecular structures, aiding in metabolite identification.

tools.name: Sirius (Robotics)
tools.one_line_profile: Robot learning framework for manipulation tasks
tools.detailed_description: Official codebase for 'Sirius: Robot Learning on the Job', a framework for robotic manipulation and learning from demonstration.

tools.name: HMcode
tools.one_line_profile: Non-linear matter power spectrum prediction
tools.detailed_description: Source code for the Halo Model (HMcode) to predict the non-linear matter power spectrum in cosmology, widely used in weak lensing and large-scale structure analysis.

tools.name: annsa
tools.one_line_profile: Artificial neural networks for spectral analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for training and deploying artificial neural networks for spectral analysis, specifically designed for radioisotope identification from gamma-ray spectra.

tools.name: ProSpect
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for galaxy spectral energy distributions
tools.detailed_description: An R package for generating and fitting spectral energy distributions (SEDs) of galaxies, used in astronomy to model star formation histories and metallicity.

tools.name: G-SchNet
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for 3D molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: A generative neural network model for generating 3D molecular structures by placing atoms sequentially in 3D space, useful for drug discovery and materials science.

tools.name: RamanSPy
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Python package for integrative Raman spectroscopy data analysis
tools.detailed_description: RamanSPy is a Python package designed for the analysis of Raman spectroscopy data. It provides a framework for loading, preprocessing, analyzing, and visualizing Raman spectra, supporting various tasks in chemical analysis and material science.

tools.name: ms-pred
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network model for predicting tandem mass spectra from molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting tandem mass spectra (MS/MS) from molecular structures using neural networks. It aids in the identification of small molecules by generating synthetic spectra for comparison with experimental data.

tools.name: DeepeR
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for Raman spectroscopy analysis
tools.detailed_description: DeepeR applies deep learning techniques to the analysis of Raman spectroscopy data, facilitating tasks such as classification and identification of chemical species from spectral signatures.

tools.name: spectrai
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for spectral data analysis
tools.detailed_description: spectrai is a deep learning framework designed specifically for handling and analyzing spectral data, providing tools for training models on spectroscopic datasets.

tools.name: PALMA
tools.one_line_profile: Improved algorithm for DOSY NMR signal processing
tools.detailed_description: PALMA (Proximal Algorithm for L1-MAtrix-free) is an algorithm for processing Diffusion-Ordered Spectroscopy (DOSY) NMR data, offering improved signal separation and analysis capabilities.

tools.name: nonnegative_matrix_factorization
tools.one_line_profile: NMF implementation for GC-MS spectral deconvolution
tools.detailed_description: A Java implementation of Non-negative Matrix Factorization (NMF) specifically tailored for the spectral deconvolution of Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) data.

tools.name: SIRIUS
tools.one_line_profile: Domain specific library for electronic structure calculations
tools.detailed_description: SIRIUS is a domain-specific library for electronic structure calculations, implementing Density Functional Theory (DFT) and related methods. It is designed to be used as a backend for various materials science codes.

tools.name: SpectralMachine
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning software for rapid analysis of scientific spectra
tools.detailed_description: SpectralMachine is a software tool designed to apply machine learning algorithms to the analysis of scientific spectral data, facilitating rapid classification and feature extraction.

tools.name: cfmR
tools.one_line_profile: R Wrapper for CFM-ID metabolite identification algorithm
tools.detailed_description: cfmR provides an R interface to the Competitive Fragmentation Modeling for Metabolite Identification (CFM-ID) algorithm, enabling users to predict electrospray ionization tandem mass spectra (ESI-MS/MS) from chemical structures.

tools.name: PyCFMID
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for CFM-ID
tools.detailed_description: PyCFMID is a Python wrapper for the CFM-ID (Competitive Fragmentation Modeling for Metabolite Identification) tool, allowing Python users to integrate MS/MS spectrum prediction and metabolite identification into their workflows.

tools.name: Alchromy
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for spectral deconvolution of UV-Vis waveforms
tools.detailed_description: Alchromy is a Python package designed for the spectral deconvolution of UV-Vis waveforms, aiding in the analysis of overlapping spectral signals in chemical samples.

tools.name: spec2vec
tools.one_line_profile: Word2Vec based similarity measure for mass spectrometry data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that computes spectral similarities between mass spectra using a Word2Vec-based approach, treating peaks and losses as 'words' in a document.

tools.name: Prosit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for high quality MS2 spectra and iRT prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that predicts peptide tandem mass spectra and retention times (iRT) for any organism and protease, facilitating proteomic data analysis.

tools.name: PredFull
tools.one_line_profile: Full-spectrum prediction of peptide tandem mass spectra using Deep Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep neural network model designed to predict the full tandem mass spectra of peptides, aiding in peptide identification and proteomic analysis.

tools.name: ProteoLizard-AlgorithmToolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning algorithms for processing ion-mobility mass spectrometry (IMS-MS) data
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit containing advanced machine learning algorithms specifically optimized for processing and analyzing ion-mobility mass spectrometry (IMS-MS) raw data.

tools.name: ms2deepscore
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning similarity measure for comparing MS/MS spectra
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses deep learning to predict the structural similarity between two chemical structures based on their MS/MS spectra.

tools.name: SPECTRA
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral framework for evaluation of biomedical AI models
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for the evaluation and benchmarking of biomedical AI models, specifically focusing on tasks involving spectral data or spectral graph theory applications in biomedicine.

tools.name: global-spectral-deconvolution
tools.one_line_profile: Global Spectra Deconvolution and peak optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript/TypeScript library for global spectral deconvolution (GSD) and peak optimization, commonly used in processing NMR and Mass Spectrometry data.

tools.name: pDeepXL
tools.one_line_profile: MS/MS spectrum prediction for cross-linked peptide pairs
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for predicting MS/MS spectra of cross-linked peptides, aiding in the analysis of cross-linking mass spectrometry (XL-MS) data.

tools.name: CASCADE
tools.one_line_profile: Calculation of NMR Chemical Shifts using Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the rapid and accurate prediction of NMR chemical shifts using deep learning models, supporting stereochemical assignment.

tools.name: CoSpred
tools.one_line_profile: Mass Spectrometry Spectrum Prediction Workflow
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for predicting mass spectrometry spectra, developed by Pfizer Open Source, likely for metabolomics or small molecule analysis.

tools.name: SIRIUS
tools.one_line_profile: Software for metabolite identification using tandem mass spectrometry
tools.detailed_description: SIRIUS is a java-based software framework for the identification of small molecules from tandem mass spectrometry (MS/MS) data. It integrates isotope pattern analysis and fragmentation tree computation to predict molecular formulas and structures.

tools.name: SIRIUS Client OpenAPI
tools.one_line_profile: OpenAPI client libraries for interacting with SIRIUS services
tools.detailed_description: Provides generated client libraries (Python, R, etc.) to interact with the SIRIUS web services and local instances programmatically, enabling automation of metabolite identification workflows.

tools.name: sirius-libs
tools.one_line_profile: Core Java libraries for the SIRIUS mass spectrometry framework
tools.detailed_description: Contains the core algorithmic libraries and data structures used by the SIRIUS software for processing mass spectrometry data and identifying molecular formulas.

tools.name: Trident
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic spectral generation suite for astrophysical simulations
tools.detailed_description: Trident is a Python package for creating synthetic absorption-line spectra from astrophysical hydrodynamics simulations. It allows researchers to generate mock observations to compare with real telescopic data.

tools.name: Spectral-Gromov-Wasserstein
tools.one_line_profile: Library for spectral graph matching and clustering via optimal transport
tools.detailed_description: Implements the Spectral Gromov-Wasserstein distance for comparing and matching shapes or graphs based on their heat kernels. Useful in scientific data analysis for shape correspondence and structural comparison.

tools.name: DeepMass
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tools for mass spectrometry data analysis
tools.detailed_description: DeepMass is a suite of tools developed by Verily Life Sciences for analyzing mass spectrometry data using modern machine learning techniques, focusing on tasks like peptide identification and quantification.

tools.name: Oktoberfest
tools.one_line_profile: Rescoring and spectral library generation pipeline for proteomics
tools.detailed_description: Oktoberfest is a pipeline that uses deep learning predictions (e.g., from Prosit) to generate spectral libraries and rescore peptide-spectrum matches (PSMs) in proteomics data, improving identification rates.
